document.full_text: consumer goods giants unilever   and procter & gamble  were fined 315.2 million euros ($456 million) by eu regulators on wednesday for fixing washing powder prices in eight eu countries.
document.title: unilever, p&g fined 315 million euros for price fixing
lines_and_colors: consumer goods giants unilever   and procter & gamble  were fined 315.2 million euros ($456 million) by eu regulators on wednesday for fixing washing powder prices in eight eu countries.
